content: get into the holiday spirit with our red truck christmas ornament crochet pattern this easy-level project is perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike the pattern includes detailed written instructions and a video tutorial for extra guidance create a festive miniature ornament that will add charm to your tree or make a thoughtful handmade gift this project works up quickly and requires only 40 yards of yarn the finished ornament measures approx 4 long x 2 5 tall excluding hanging loop perfect for hanging on the tree or topping a special gift add a touch of handmade warmth to your holiday decor with this adorable crochet ornament pattern **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for all skill levels includes written instructions and video tutorials uses only 40 total yards of yarn for a quick project finished ornament features a charming red truck with evergreen tree design perfect for adding handmade charm to your holiday decor **materials needed-** hook 4mm us size 6 0 - susan bates https //amzn to/4ptxhys yarn bernat maker minis https //amzn to/48svom4 bulky weight 40 yards notions small amt fiberfill https //amzn to/4pr0bgy
